ball.databind

Class JSONBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • ball.databind.JSONBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Channel, Channel.PK, JSONEntity, LineupEntry, Schedule.PK, SDProtocol.GetLineupsResponse, SDProtocol.GetStatusResponse, SDProtocol.GetVersionResponse, SDProtocol.LineupElement, SDProtocol.PostTokenResponse, SDProtocol.Schedules

    public abstract class JSONBean
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Abstract base class for bean implementations that wrap a JsonNode.

    • Method Detail

      • nodeAt

        protected JsonNode nodeAt(String expression)
        Convenience method to call JsonNode.at(String).
        Parameters:
        expression - The String respresentation of the JsonPointer.
        Returns:
        JsonNode that matches given JsonPointer: if no match exists, will return a JsonNode for which TreeNode.isMissingNode() returns true.

      • textAt

        protected String textAt(String expression)
        Convenience method to get text for a node. See nodeAt(String).
        Parameters:
        expression - See nodeAt(String).
        Returns:
        JsonNode.asText() of nodeAt(String).

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
